meanings.definition: to decay or break down naturally
meanings.sent1: Leaves left on the ground will eventually biodegrade.
meanings.sent2: It is important to use materials that can biodegrade in compost.
meanings.sent3: The banana peel decided to biodegrade into the soil and become one with nature.
meanings.sent4: The old wooden fence seemed to biodegrade slowly, like a fading memory.
meanings.sent5: The fallen tree began to biodegrade, turning into rich soil for new plants to grow.
